column1: Joe Biden would have been a disaster if he were at the helm of USA’s response to #coronavirus!  @realDonaldTrump’s leadership saved lives.   No one can lead America’s comeback like he will. #MAGA2020Landslide https://t.co/05TOYOIdTT

Can you imagine if Joe Biden or Bernie Sanders were running the country’s response to Coronavirus?! The American people WOULD NOT have same confidence that they have in @realDonaldTrump to bring leadership needed in such a challenging time. Thankful that @POTUS is at the helm!!
